channel.title: Speed Help
channel.description:
Ok, I didn't get any help for this last night so I'm posting it again.
I've got my own server, so when it's up I usually have to be on there and administrate. I recently turned my server off and went to another server, just to see what else is available and I noticed that the server was a lot faster than mine, with very little to no lag. I talked to the owner, and asked him why his might be faster. We had the same thing, fr33sc4p3 based servers, cable internet connections, etc. I was just wondering what I could do to make my server faster. My server lags like hell at 8-11 people and crashes at around 12. His server starts to lag at 44 people and crashes at more.
So, I just wanted to know why my server is slow and what I could do to fix it. I've already used the disk cleanup thing.

item.title: Speed Help
item.dc:creator: @xone xone
item.description:
@xone wrote:

Where can I get a good auto restarter?

Read full topic
